navbarTabs.delete_confirmation.title: Are you sure you want to delete your digital profile?
navbarTabs.delete_confirmation.descripti: We noticed you have purchased a physical smart Mibio product for this digital profile. This action results in the complete removal of your profile hence making your physical Mibio product useless. We recommend you to disable your profile instead.

userPageSettings.button.title: Single Link Mode
userPageSettings.input.title: Please enter the URL including the 'http://' or 'https://' prefix.
userPageSettings.input.help: Turn Single Link Mode on to share this link directly without showing your digital profile.
dashboard.insights.title: Smart Insights
dashboard.insights.subtitle: Coming soon
dashboard.insights.viewsovertime.title: Views Over Time
dashboard.insights.views.title: Views
dashboard.insights.views.helper: Views are generated when you tap your NFC smart business card on another person's smartphone, causing your digital profile to load. This action indicates that someone has taken a closer look at the information you've provided in your digital profile. It's a valuable metric to measure the level of engagement your profile is attracting.
dashboard.insights.contacts.title: Contact Taps
dashboard.insights.contacts.helper: Contact Taps are generated when someone clicks on one of the links related to your contact information, such as your email address or phone number. This action indicates that someone is interested in reaching out to you. This metric helps you track the effectiveness of your contact information you've shared on your digital profile.
dashboard.insights.socials.title: Social Taps
dashboard.insights.socials.helper: Social Taps are generated when someone clicks on one of the links related to your social media profiles, such as your Facebook or Instagram. This action indicates that someone is interested in connecting with you on social platforms. It's a great way to measure the impact of your social media links within your profile.
dashboard.insights.savedcontacts.title: Contacts Saved
dashboard.insights.savedcontacts.helper: Contacts Saved are generated when someone clicks on “Save Contact”. This action means that someone has saved your contact information for future use. It's a valuable metric that helps you know how many people find your digital profile worth saving.
linksInputValidation.default.url: Please enter the username without the URL.

card.preview.initialInactive: Your profile is currently only visible to you. To activate it, purchase our smart Mibio product from mibio.am. If you've already made a purchase, call us at 055228252 or contact our support team at support@mibio.am for activation.
card.preview.userInactive: Enable your profile! Your profile is currently only visible to you.
